title: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: When using JDK 1.4, the Open Type dialog displays obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd' and others. These classes are not expected to be shown in the dialog.
OB: In the Open Type dialog, obfuscated classes are displayed prominently.
EB: Obfuscated classes should not be shown in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the application using JDK 1.4. 
2. Open the Open Type dialog. 
3. Observe that obfuscated classes are displayed in the dialog.
